WorkItem.Description:
It would be very nice to be able to specify the collection element type was the key (for items that have no real organic/natural key).  That way, collections like the following could be defined:
Â 
<maps>
  <map name="Mapping 1" mapValue="ABC">
    <applicableValues>
      <applicableValue value1="a" value2="1"/>
      <applicableValue value1="a" value2="2"/>
      <applicableValue value1="b" value2="1"/>
    </applicableValues>
  </map>
  <map name="Mapping 2" mapValue="DEF">
    <applicableValues>
      <applicableValue value1="a" value2="3"/>
      <applicableValue value1="b" value2="3"/>
      <applicableValue value1="b" value2="4"/>
    </applicableValues>
  </map>
</maps>
